scripts.build: npm run build-64 && npm run build-win32 && npm run build-linux32
scripts.build-64: node build.js && npm run build-mac && npm run build-win && npm run build-linux
scripts.build-win: node build.js && electron-packager ./ 'Glyphr Studio' --app-bundle-id=glyphr-studio-desktop --version-string.FileDescription='Glyphr Studio Desktop' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=0.1.3
scripts.build-win32: node build.js && electron-packager ./ 'Glyphr Studio' --app-bundle-id=glyphr-studio-desktop --version-string.FileDescription='Glyphr Studio Desktop' --icon=images/appicon.ico --asar --prune --out=build --overwrite=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=1.2.6 --app-version=0.1.3
